Reviews.Content: Great tablet. Good small size and functions well. I just wished I could use Windows Office programs on it instead of the half baked android office programs. They don't play well with each other. Otherwise, I love it and will use it a lot for a long time.

Reviews.Title: Asus Nexus 7
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: What a great tablet with a super-crisp display and nice sound.  Great battery life.  But best of all are the vast number of Android apps that run so well.  I found Evernote on this tablet is even better than it is on a Windows desktop!

Reviews.Title: Love my Nexus 7
Reviews.Author: Holger Bruning
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th android. Now my absolute favorite. I like it so much, that I no longer use my laptops. I still use my desktop for major projects but aside from that I am using the Nexus 7 exclusively. This mini tablet does everything I need it to do and plenty more. What I like most about it is that it is as portable, and as comfortable to use as a smartphone but has a large enough screen to read websites clearly and typing on the onscreen keyboard is not a hassle.Of-cause to utilize all of its capabilities one has to "root" the Nexus. No big deal, just google it. People always say "ya but you void the warranty if you do that"That is not a problem. You can "un-root" the mini tablet as quickly as you rooted it. If you have a hardware failure and you cant un-root it anymore no one is going to know what you did with it anyway.So go ahead and do it and enjoy this marvelous piece of technology.  HB

Reviews.Title: exceeded expections
Reviews.Author: A Feeney
Reviews.Content: does everything you could want at speed and with great battery life. perfect price (didnt't buy through amazon). fully tested it running many apps, streaming music etc at the same time; it can handle anything I throw at it.i have to say it works fantasticly well with the bluetooth keyboard cases which you can get on amazon and elsewhere (there are many manufacturers, i got the IVSO one but i think they are all the same). With the same back as the nexus it feels like an official accessorybuy it. you want be dissappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Dfreeman319
Reviews.Content: Having researched many of the tablets out there and not willing to spend 500$ on one, This was my choice. This had the best battery life, screen brightness and resolution.I would have like an SD slot but 32gb is plenty for me My only complaintIs this thing does have a lot of integrated Google stuff that i don't want and cannot uninstall.That being said overall im very happy with this.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet I've used
Reviews.Author: Miguel Ricardo Jimenez Gomez
Reviews.Content: I'm in love with the android ecosystem and this tablet is the perfect one for it; have been using it for watching videos, reading and playing; and its been more than what I hoped for.Recommended

Reviews.Title: Best all round tablet
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: As everyone's needs or desires differ, this tablet suits mine nicely. It is small enough to transport almost anywhere and yet large enough for old eyes, not too old, to see the screen when using it for something other than reading a book.  I do not regret any aspect of this purchase.

Reviews.Title: More than expected
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: I watched a friend use his Nexus and liked the way it was built and felt in my hand. Excellent choice

Reviews.Title: So Far, Well Pleased
Reviews.Author: Brian K. Reid "Waiting for the Son"
Reviews.Content: To start with, I am a bit biased toward Android OS and devices. Now, with that said, I just purchased this within the last week and cannot say anything other than praises for it. First off, it's like holding my RAZR M in a larger version. All of my apps are at the fingertips. The resolution is outstanding in watching Netflix movies in HD quality. Viewing photos are equally a very good quality. I leave most of my music in the Cloud for listening and keeping my HDD freed up for more apps. The sound quality is equally impressive. The HDD is 32 GB, which is plenty big enough unless you are planning to store large quantities of music or videos. If so, invest in Cloud Storage. If you're looking for something with 4g service, this is not for you. For a simpler Wi-Fi connection and 3.0 Bluetooth, this is outstanding. I own an Asus laptop that I have been using for nearly 7 years without a glitch. The product name spoke for itself to me.Overall, I love this tablet. I am sure there are others who may disagree. After reviewing other reputable tablets, I kept returning to this one. Many boast of a 16 GB of HDD space at or around this price. For another $100-$200, you can buy a tablet with many of the same features. If you simply have the money to buy something more expensive with the same specs, then have at it. For me, I can use the extra money for a lot of other toys.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Tablet!
Reviews.Author: medfors
Reviews.Content: I did tons and tons of research on tablets before finally deciding on buying the Nexus 7.  It has been about 8 months since my purchase and I am still happy about my decision.

Reviews.Title: great product, the built quality matches ipad
Reviews.Author: Vilmantas V.
Reviews.Content: Great screen, solid and durable frame. Would buy Asus tablet again for sure. The size of the tablet is perfect, processor very responsive and no lagging whatsoever.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Cam-Tech
Reviews.Content: So far I really like the Nexus 7, Fast response seems well built, i would have given it fives stars but it has a few issues I don,t love. first of all no Micro SD expansion slot, Sounds is not very loud, Screen seems a little flat in color and No HDMI out. Everything so far I really like, so far battery life has been good with heavy use I got about 3 hours on 50% of battery life, have not drained it below that yet. I was going to buy the Galaxy 7 tablet but felt it was getting to old and with a Google tablet I feel that Google will support it with the latest OS until the hardware can no longer support the OS.

Reviews.Title: wow
Reviews.Author: r3d
Reviews.Content: chose nexus 7 to beat apple because of price and hatred towards apple and there os.....very user friendly and perfect little tab....

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Gary A Helms
Reviews.Content: works very well and with all the available apps your not tied to amazon exclusively.  Will run kindle, Kobo and others with no problems at all.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: TomT
Reviews.Content: After much research my wife and I determined that the Nexus 7 was the best tablet on the market and we made the right choice.  Setup is easy as 123.  HD display is fantastic.  we really enjoy downloading and reading books on the tablet.  We love everything about it and would highly recomend it to everyone.  The tablet arrived ahead of schedule and was well packed.  Very satisified!!

Reviews.Title: It definitely worth the money.
Reviews.Author: Amir Shadkam "amir astro"
Reviews.Content: It is very convenient as a ebook reader, though it is much more than just an ebook reader.I recommend the 7inch size to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet for the money
Reviews.Author: Dustin
Reviews.Content: It's easy to use, small enough to hold with one hand, and very portable.  I have an iPad as well and both are good in their own way.  I'd definitely recommend this to anyone who's looking for a tablet to carry around.

Reviews.Title: Amazing tablet, crap customer support
Reviews.Author: J. Kerby
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet for christmas. I loved it!incredibly fast to load anything and the google play store is awesome.I love the android layout compaired to the apple. it has facial recognition to unlock the tablet as a choice.4 months after having it I opene the leather case I have it in and the screen was cracked 2 huge cracks. Which after some internet searching this has happend to other people.Asus only has 1 center in the usa to send it in to get repaired and if there is any sign of wear on it theydeem it the customers fault and it is $165 dollars to get it repaired is what they told me.So my conclusion is that the product feels and looks and processes top notch. But asus does not care aboutcustomer service.

Reviews.Title: Nexus 7 changed my view of Android OS
Reviews.Author: Jordan Stowe
Reviews.Content: Ive used android in the past, used iOS, and Win7 phone and android was always slow, unresponsive, and unintuitive.  However, the Nexus 7 hardware specs and the new 4.0 OS has completely changed my mind.  The new OS is much more intuitive and use friendly, the hardware is out of this world, everything is smooth as glass.  I cant be happier with this purchase.  Need my iPhone contract to run out so I can move into the andriod world.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the money i spent
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Pros:Its fast and easy to navigateThe battery has decent life span(12 hours use/stand by)Size makes it every conveientCons:No rear facing camera/front one is low qualityCharge time is really slowThat's really all I can complain about. I am perfectly satisfied with the money I spent on it.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: fd5
Reviews.Content: I bought this unit as a gift for my baby brother; I I sure do love mine!  Chose the Nexus over the Kindle Fire as it has more flexibility, can get onto gmail, and has better storage, and has speech-to-text, etc.I also got him the OTG card reader/USB hub and an ethernet adapter so he can link directly to the internet cable (turn off the wireless!) or view his external harddrives.Movies are colorful, sound is very nice, and it's very portable (same size as my kindle keyboard).We'll load it up with File Mgr HD (need one, I picked that one), and Cool Reader (Nexus reads EPubs! and that app is real nice - my books look 'real' and I slide and flip the pages over like real books). And we'll download several other needed apps that are all free, and he's up and running!  Sweet.

Reviews.Title: Good little tablet
Reviews.Author: ArtChick "Draw or Else"
Reviews.Content: Having several apple products I decided to try something new, and am enjoying the customizability and portability of the nexus.

Reviews.Title: Amazing, simply put
Reviews.Author: CaptainTaihu
Reviews.Content: I have to say, Google's won me over. The Nexus line with pure Android is the friendliest, fastest, and best experience on mobile, bar none. The Nexus 7 is no excuse. Fast Android updates and fast performance on the Tegra 3 (compared to my TF300, which ran slowly on the quad core CPU). The price makes this tablet a home run.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: iwan bakunowich
Reviews.Content: easey to use,very responsive,good size when travelling.very light keypad,quick to connect to wifi.would make a great present for any member of your family.

Reviews.Title: Great for work/Great for college
Reviews.Author: Siddharth Gupta
Reviews.Content: This is my very first tablet and my first time going into the app world digital age and I absolutely love it. It is very user friendly and has all the google tools you will ever need to get by in life from gmail, google+, and many others. The touch sensitivity is awesome and the screen super smooth. At work, I am able to attend e-mails where ever I go, watch shows on netflix, browze youtube videos, browze reddit (lurker here), create docs/excel files using CloudOn app, and many more. Great for college because, ebooks on Google Play is extremely awesome, you get to highlight in four different colors, highlight a word and the definition pops up, and you can search for phrases in the text as it displays it in sentences where the word comes up! I used it for my research papers, works wonders!

Reviews.Title: it's wondefull
Reviews.Author: sergcafe
Reviews.Content: pros:It's very easy to use!!Start very fast...better than: it's not necesary to restart very often.it's has very powerfull HW; it works almost like a PC, but it  price is half.The adroid (4.2) works very fine; it's do a lots of things out the box. Is very easy and cheap / free to obtain solution, tools, games, etc.cont:it's  a little heavy.The battery can be better, only works for 4 to 6 hours of continue use.could be better if it would have 8-inch display (and thinner).The batery charger is awful (really!)I am concerned about the privacy, due the  front camera with out a phisical on/ off switch.Overall experience:Great value and usefull for a good price.

Reviews.Title: Love this tablet love it love it love it
Reviews.Author: Revaa07
Reviews.Content: This tablet rocks. Its so easy to use and I'm so happy I brought it. I would and have told everyoe I know just how nice this tablet is. And it's not real heavy which is really nice.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet at a very good price
Reviews.Author: Katherine Redwine
Reviews.Content: Not 5 stars because:1. The stock launcher must be replaced if you like to customize your settings.  It is like a dumbed down version of ADW with no user options.  I replaced it with the free version of ADW.2. This was a replacement for a Nook Tablet running CM10 (N2A) with ADW.  Inspite of the increase in multi-core processing ability it really doesn't feel faster than the Nook for most things.  This is not a serious knock since a NT running N2A is a pretty solid dual core tablet.  The GPS and gyro are nice for Nav and Astronomy apps.3. The entire front of the device from edge-to-edge  is a single slab of flat, slick glass, making it very hard to hold as a Reader.

Reviews.Title: Technology, technology
Reviews.Author: Jack B. Harmon "Granpa Jack"
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating not because of all the astounding technology involved in this futuristic instrument, but because of the poor documentation that goes along with many of the apps. Here I had the tablet all set up when I decided to experiment with some "wall paper". Now I'm afraid I might have to reset it back to factory conditions.

Reviews.Title: great model
Reviews.Author: Erick S. Oliveira "Erick Soares"
Reviews.Content: Very fast and compact. I also have an Asus FT300 and the Nexus seems to be as fast or even faster.Only bad point is the built-in camera , as picture quality is very poor. But for me, no problem at all as I use my phone 12MP camera .Size and costs are just perfect for my use.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet ! !
Reviews.Author: William Blount
Reviews.Content: Works really well for me, it will not replace my laptop at home but it is the perfect size for traveling, reading and keeping up to date with email's and Skype. I am certainly not tempted to move over to Apple products.

Reviews.Title: I love my Nexus 7
Reviews.Author: chris1971
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect device for commuting on mass transit.  I can play any format of movie without any lag.  I use it to read books and listen to music. Just big enough to read comics on.  It will run any app I've tried (as it should).  Its like a little entertainment center.  I had a 10 inch tablet before and was worried that this would be too small, however, it is the perfect size in my opinion.  You can carry it in your inside pocket of your jacket.  The device runs smooth as silk.  Best of all is the price!!  I 100% recommend this device.

Reviews.Title: Pleased with the purchase and shipping from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Dave Azerolo
Reviews.Content: Even though I'm technology challenged, the Nexus 7 met all my expectations and I am learning more about it everyday.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TABLET
Reviews.Author: yung l
Reviews.Content: I believe this is the best 7 inch tablet in the market! It is so underrated here in amazon ! Should be 5 stars

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet, only one complaint
Reviews.Author: Kay Z
Reviews.Content: This tablet is AWESOME. My only complaint is not having micro sd capability. I know there are ways around this, but they are pains compared to having access to that awesome little chip of data. I don't mind not having the back camera at all, and feel the better front camera is a good trade for the dual front and back cameras on other tablet. Don't really need a camera on both the tablet and cell phone, but having a better front camera for skyping with family and friends far away is nice. Overall a great tablet, access to market, doesn't try to keep you from doing too much the way so many of the other tablets try to box you in on what you can access and download. Overall happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Simply the best 7'' tablet worldwide
Reviews.Author: Ahmed
Reviews.Content: This great tablet brings to you the best android tablet experience ever.Sharp screen, long battery life, clear sound, fast performance, and really good build

Reviews.Title: Great tablet at a value price
Reviews.Author: AndreaMelzo
Reviews.Content: I decided to go for a Nexus tablet for the reason I would have my tablet updated as soon as Google sends Android updates out.And I love the 7" size, so easy to handle. The price is great.

Reviews.Title: GREAT....
Reviews.Author: BRIDGETT
Reviews.Content: I REALLY ENJOY MY NEXUS 7 TABLET. IT'S EASY TO USE. ALSO I LOVE ALL OF THE APPS AVAILABLE.I'M GLAD I BOUGHT IT. I DID SOME RESEARCH AND THE NEXUS 7 WAS HIGHLY RATED.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Anna Seiley
Reviews.Content: I did a lot if research before making this purchase and I'm totally happy with the Nexus 7. It's an awesome tablet for the price, super fast and can handle switching between apps with no problem. One thing I would love is a rear facing camera, other than that I have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: i like this..
Reviews.Author: bill cooley
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with my Nexus 7. I am not a young guy who is computer savvy and all that but this little tablet can do lots of stuff and I really like it.

Reviews.Title: A great tablet
Reviews.Author: R. Yetter
Reviews.Content: You can get the specs from any number of sources so I won't go into those details.  This is one of the best Android tablets, probably second only to the Samsung tablets.  Good screen, good power, good storage.  Great as an e-reader, email device, checking facebook and the like.  Descent battery life and all of this in a convenient, easy to carry size.

Reviews.Title: NOT TURNING ON
Reviews.Author: JACK
Reviews.Content: ONE OF THE TABLETS IS NOT WORKING AND I GAVE IT TO THE ISRAELI COMPANY THAT DEALS WITH NEXUS, HOPE THEY WILL FIX IT!!

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: Santiago Barriga
Reviews.Content: I have a motor fun with this tablet, sorry about the rear camera bit bits not a great deal !!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: nice tablet
Reviews.Author: Bruce
Reviews.Content: A very smart tablet.i  like  it .But  the power is not enough and  if  it can also be a mobile ,it will be nicer.

Reviews.Title: The first tablet that might actually be as good if not better than and IPad
Reviews.Author: Gideon
Reviews.Content: IPads are still the gold standard in tablets, however, this one is on parr with the IPad.  First the size is great, if you're worried about 7" being too small, it's not; for media consumption it's perfect; for reading in bed, perfect.  Even for use at work taking notes using a blue tooth keyboard it's perfect.  Mine runs well and is super fast.  The screen is fantastic and it's a good looking quality tablet.For personal use and media consumption I think it's about the perfect tablet out of all that are on the market right now; even watching a movie on it is fantastic.  Use Google Media Importer app and a Micro USB OTG cable and you can connect a thumb drive or even a wireless mouse so there's almost no data limit anymore.  It's simply a fantastic devise all the way around.  I'd highly recomend the Bamboo Solo Stylus and the MoKo slim case; those two accessories are absolutely perfect for this unit.The only thing I've noticed about this unit is that it's very slow to charge, even using a wall outlet and when I run Netflix on it, it's not perfectly smooth 100% of the time like it is on my Ipod Touch.  Every once in a while it'll skip for a fraction of a second; I'm talking once, maybe twice in a 1/2 hour.  Also, it may "buffer" a bit more often than I noticed on an Ipad Touch or Ipad.I think this is the perfect "one tablet to do all" devise, however, if I was getting a tablet that was mostly for business/work, I'd still get the larger Ipad and match it to a keyboard / case from Clamcase.The other advantage about the Nexus 7 is the cost; it's SO much cheaper than the Ipad!!Gideon

Reviews.Title: buen producto
Reviews.Author: Alejandro Blanco
Reviews.Content: producto recomendado, en el poco tiempo  que he disfrutado de el me parece que tiene buena resolución es fácil de manejar y velocidad adecuada para revisar los archivos.

Reviews.Title: Best Android tablet
Reviews.Author: Rogue Elf
Reviews.Content: My first tablet was the Kindle Fire (1st Gen).  It was very user friendly but Amazon did nothing to keep it on the current Android OS.  It simply became outdated and I was unable to install most new apps on it.  The Asus Nexus is Google branded and Google remains dedicated to keeping the OS current as well as the apps themselves.  It does require a bit of tech savvy, but only a tiny bit.

Reviews.Title: Excellent, but
Reviews.Author: Ezzo
Reviews.Content: I wish it had 3G. It is a bit too expensive for the WiFi only model, but it fits the purpose for the kids to play and learn with.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Joshua
Reviews.Content: I couldn't have asked for a better tablet.  I am so happy I didn't choose the iPad.  Used a friends and my moms ipad, its a kids toy.

Reviews.Title: WOW this tablet is much better than I thought it was going to be and I thought it was good before I recieved it!
Reviews.Author: Roger Luce
Reviews.Content: Great free apps, You can plug in a hard drive or a cd drive and even a memory stick. Best thing about this tablet is the HD screen. The next best thing is outstanding applications you can download for FREE!!!!Some of the best apps are:GyroSpace 3D (live wallpapper), Nexus media importer (needed for using memory plugged to to power connector), solar stars (VERY COOL LOOKING app), Art Particals (very cool app and fun to play with), Xperia Z (amazing live wallpapper), Real racing (great car racing game), Ball rider (very cool puzzle game), F18 carrier landing (cool tilt flying game), Office suite (like ms office for word and excell use), Voice search (ask google a question and it talks back to you with the answer), Youtube download (down loads youtube videos) and gesture shortcuts (go to shortcuts with a swipe of your finger).This computer is FAST, Fun and easy to use. It is great for sharing photos, videos or just for browsing the internet. I have had NO problems with it and after one month I LOVE IT!  G E T  Y O U R S  N O W ! ! !  Roger

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: BornAProphet
Reviews.Content: Its super fast. Updated to 4.2(Jelly Bean) right away. Movies look great. Games like GTA and Sonic 4 run at highest settings. Multitasking works awesome. My kids are able to use it (9 and 11) I recommend to anyone. Will not find another product of this quality for the same price,

Reviews.Title: Great tablet.  No complaints.
Reviews.Author: Greg Bahns
Reviews.Content: Very convenient at 7 inches.  Screen is great.  Battery life seems pretty good, usually lasts for days - though admittedly on average I only use it about an hour a day.

Reviews.Title: Asus Nexus 7
Reviews.Author: Matthew Jason Tegeler
Reviews.Content: This was a good purchase but there are a few complaints. The internet is slower than I thought it would be. There are no HDMI hookups so keyboard hookups can be a pain. The screen is vivid but the sound doesn't get too loud. Still a worthwhile purchase.

Reviews.Title: 11 and 13 year old boys love it.
Reviews.Author: OTazMan
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these for my 11 and 13 year old boys for Christmas. They love them and haven't touched their GameBoys since. Will this finally be the end of Nintendo crappy hardware. They love it that they can buy great games for 5 dollars or less instead of 30+ for one GameBoy game.

Reviews.Title: Fast and full of features
Reviews.Author: Mariano
Reviews.Content: It has a very good cost value relation.  I changed a Kindle Fire due to slowness using the last Android version and the lack of some features, like gps, microphone, camera and volume controls. It's cheap comparing it to other tablets in the market with same specs.Battery stands long, I can use it for two days without charging it.

Reviews.Title: awesome!!!!
Reviews.Author: Enzo Perdomo
Reviews.Content: Got my N7 before the estimated date .. It was a refurbished n7 but it looks and feels like new ... Awesome service and tablet overall

Reviews.Title: Nexus 7 it'S GREAT
Reviews.Author: Miguel Angel Lazarin Coronado
Reviews.Content: the nexus 7 is a tablet with many practique and funcional characteristics. The resolution of the screen is very good and sensible, it also works quickly in every aplication. The stetic of the tablet is very atractive and one of the most remarkable thing is that it come with several predeterminated aplications of Google, this apps. are very usefull.

Reviews.Title: The product I was looking forward
Reviews.Author: Juan Aldamizechevarria
Reviews.Content: The product i was looking forward. One of the reasons it was my choice is that it can be connected to USB and watch movies in streaming, it works perfect!!One bad point, the battery does not long very much (one day hard using), but I guess i used too much the first days and I didnt spend time looking for apps or uses to be more efficient there.

Reviews.Title: Nice size
Reviews.Author: Keith McDowell "Macd's"
Reviews.Content: Just the right size to carry along and very fast.It would be nice to have more of an instruction book that comes along with it tho and not just online.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Travis L Brown
Reviews.Content: I've had this tablet since early February.  The tablet seems to hold power for a number of days on standby without being charged, which is good for my infrequent use.  I like that I can use the same applications as my Android phone.  So far no negatives of buying this tablet versus a Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Excelent Tablet for great price.
Reviews.Author: Roberto Abarca Cárdenas
Reviews.Content: The Nexus 7 is one of the best gadgets of the year 2012 not by nothing. It's a great tablet with true Android experience, just thr way it should be.

Reviews.Title: Met expectations
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This mini tablet has met all of my expectations. It reads well and keeps its charge. I'm glad I purchased it.

Reviews.Title: So Happy With My Choice
Reviews.Author: Natalie Kingsfield
Reviews.Content: I had been contemplating purchasing a tablet and had sought guidance from online forums on the differences between the Nexus 7 and the Kindle Fire. The Nexus is everything I wanted and more!

Reviews.Title: Sweet Tablet
Reviews.Author: TIM SIMMONS
Reviews.Content: very nice tablet for the price, I recommend it for anyone wanting a high quality tablet for a low price

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Evan A. Kelley
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best purchases I've ever made... Also, it shipped and arrived at my home much dinner than I expected!

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Jeesus
Reviews.Content: it's great, the Google actualization for the nexus products is just the best. the only left thing is the no rear camera

Reviews.Title: I've had it for 4 months now, WOW.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Yea, I'm a Horse."
Reviews.Content: This tables changed the way I use the Android os and the way i use the internet. This will become an invaluable ally in the battle against boredom.

Reviews.Title: Great machine
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This thing is a little hotrod. It's light and has great picture. Works great surfing, on YouTube, watching movies, reading, etc.

Reviews.Title: simply the best tablet of 2012
Reviews.Author: carlos
Reviews.Content: fast, smooth,  for me the very best tablet of the market right now, only thing to improve is the lack of a rear facing camera with at least 5MP but still an excellent purchase

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: MAC
Reviews.Content: light, fast, nice screen, moko slim-fit case is very useful and protect nexus very well. I will have to proof  the tablet in deep.

Reviews.Title: nice tablet
Reviews.Author: ben
Reviews.Content: I have another nexus 7 and bought this for my sister. Nexus 7 is a nice tablet and it can support multiple account with latest android update. I love the stock android update I get.

Reviews.Title: My boyfriend uses it every day!
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: So awesome. Better than Ipad he tells me. So happy amazon has great sellers and I will continue to purchase from them. This item was so worth it. Especially since its something he uses everyday!!!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful tablet
Reviews.Author: KT
Reviews.Content: I have had this tablet for about 3 months now and am very happy with it.  It has plenty of storage space on it.  It's fast and very efficient.  All the apps I need has downloaded smoothly and quickly.  The screen is crisp and clear.  I have recommended this tablet to everyone looking for one.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful
Reviews.Author: Cesar Marcano
Reviews.Content: Beautiful. Excellent product. Lightweight, versatile, excellent quality product, very good resolution. I am pleased with the Nexus tablet. The strongly recommend

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: Alexandros M. Collie "bah techie"
Reviews.Content: For a time for me it was a toss up between the Apple Minipad and the Nexus 7. I decided to go with the Nexus 7 and I have been happy with my choose ever since. Shortly after charging and starting the Nexus 7 I received updates. One of my concerns was the fact that the home screen did not auto rotate.  However, my home screen does auto rotate. Also , there are alot of apps in the google play store.  One note to anyone researching whether to buy this or not. My experience was that alot of the reviews under stated this device potential. These were usually people who loved apple products. Both products are excellent it as my wife owns an apple minipad, it really comes down to your preference.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: javier
Reviews.Content: very good quality you can see films, perfect for google, perfect size I am really happy with my new nexus 7

Reviews.Title: Great.
Reviews.Author: Guilherme "You miss 100 percent of the shots ...
Reviews.Content: Asus Nexus 7 is fast and has a very good cost benefit relationship. Just updated to the latest android versions. And I'm loving it.

Reviews.Title: Just what I intended
Reviews.Author: djc
Reviews.Content: The tablet was a gift, and the recipient is delighted with it. Therefore so am I. And because it's a first tablet in the household, the household is impressed with how well it does what it's supposed to, and how painlessly it updates itself.Excellent screen, very usable keyboard -- I'd never buy this or any similar item without the keyboard -- and the size is a fine compromise between portability and legibility. Third-party power supplies are available for when you forget the included power supply in a distant place, as we just did.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: numbercruncher
Reviews.Content: This has replaced my laptop and smart phone in just about every way.I can video chat, e-mail, speech to text, read books, play emulators, and generally waste time very effectively!I dropped down to a normal 'dumb' phone, saving $30-50 per month, and I use this with wifi instead.  At only$210, I will have saved money after 5-6 months.

Reviews.Title: it very good,size and weight match with my hand
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Now, I never want more entertain tabled. Just only Nexus 7. Lead me to looking for another Nexus product. Actual I have both IPad mini and Nexus 7. I love Nexus 7 more than.

Reviews.Title: So far so good...
Reviews.Author: Brian Weiss
Reviews.Content: Tablets and phones are emotional subjects with everyone having their personal preferences and favorites.In my view, a tablet is not yet a "must have" item given that you have a laptop for mobile work and a smartphone (I'm still using my trusted blackberry - though I know that is not the common trend today) for communications.  It's a "nice to have".  Again, everyone will have a different opinion on this.This is my first tablet.  My primary usage scenario is to have this device in my room (hotel or home) for quick checks of e-mail, news, etc. in a format that is more convenient in terms of screen real-estate than my phone.  Plus, good for taking to meetings and out-of-office activities where I am carrying a bag anyway (phone is all I take when it's just what i can carry in my pockets) and a full laptop is overkill and/or not appropriate for the style of meeting/event.I have this set up as an (expensive) digital alarm clock when I'm not using it, and I can quickly grab it when I need to.  Used it on a flight to see a movie, do some light reading on it, and mostly use it for short e-mail/browsing sessions.  Also convenient to have it for maps.I'm a Google user so it was natural to use Android with its strong connectivity to my Google account and settings.  I use iTunes for music, but this is not primarily an entertainment device for me (I have a nano iPad for my portable music for workouts) so that was not a factor.I think the price/feature trade-offs on this device are excellent. Not paying iPad premiums, but getting all the functionality I need.  Have yet to find something I want to do that doesn't have a free Google Play application/widget ready.  Wifi is great (I have a myfi for mobility if I need it) and so far, this is definitely fitting the bill for me.I'm not "religious" about this - I'm sure there are many good alternatives including some with features I would benefit from.  But so far, this is exactly what I thought it would be - even finding myself using a bit more than I thought I would... we'll see if that lasts once the "new toy" energy wears off....In terms of this specific device, my only negatives are:* I find the buttons (volume and power) to be not ideal to press, especially now that I have the device sitting inside a protective case that I bought.  The buttons are accessible, but I have to "work" to press them.* Would be good to have a camera on the back so I could use it to take pictures and not just for video-conferencing.Other than that, no issues so far... very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Kyle B. Kennedy "D-OveRMinD"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace my iPad 2, because we are just so invested in Android.  My wife has a Galaxy Note 10, my 5 year old daughter has a Galaxy Tab 7, I have a Galaxy Nexus phone, and my wife has a Galaxy SIII phone.  We have a Macbook Pro and an iPad2 as well.  I liked the smaller size of the Tab 7, especially when sitting in the airport or on the plan or in bed, and I like the "pure" google experience without the Samsung, HTC, etc overlays and skins.  Plus the Nexus line gets updates before anyone else.  And finally, this uses a STANDARD micro USB port instead of the proprietary connectors like Apple and, yes, Samsung use.When I took it out of the box, it immediately downloaded and installed Jelly Bean 4.2.2...yes, 4.2.2.As far as performance, I really expected a tiny bit more out of the Tegra 3 on games.  Normal stuff like Pulse, Freely, Chrome, Touchdown, etc all run super fast, all at the same time.  But games like My Little Pony, when there are tons of items on the screen, tends to hitch a bit.  Not enough to kill gameplay, but it's noticeable.As for accessories, I HIGHLY recommend the desktop dock and the car holder, both of which I bought from Amazon and are perfectly built for the Nexus.  The desktop dock is a custom snug fit, while the car adapter is slightly more generic, will fit the Nexus perfectly, but won't fit items like the Tab 7.http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B008NP7R7Shttp://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B004M8ST36

Reviews.Title: As good or better than expected.
Reviews.Author: Mark Twain afficionado
Reviews.Content: The Nexus 7 I received 5 days ago meets or exceeds my expectations.  The screen is sharp, bright and clear, providing excellent images, videos, and text.  I was especially pleased by the clarity of the text, as my principal use for the tablet is reading e-mail and news articles.  The touch screen is sensitive and responsive.I experimented with the GPS function on a trip over a known route, and it was quite accurate, once I had figured out that activating it involved settings in two different locations.  I have not used the tablet for a long enough period to fully evaluate the duration of the battery charge.One factor in my choice of the Nexus 7 was that it uses the pure Android OS, and it is not tied to a particular eco-system, such as Amazon or Barnes & Noble.  Although it ships with the Google Store installed, I easily added the Amazon Store to my apps, and also installed the Kindle reader app.I was concerned about memory limitations, since there is no slot for an SD card, but I read about the use of a USB OTG cable, and ordered one when I ordered the table.  I have used this to view and load photos from my camera memory card.  The lack of a slot is not a drawback.I would recommend this tablet to anyone with who wants a small, light, easily portable tablet for browsing the web, reading news articles, and e-mail.  At home, I will continue to use my Kindle for reading books,  but while traveling I will be happy to leave the Kindle at home and do all my reading on the Nexus 7, so I can carry only one item.

Reviews.Title: Arrived as advertised
Reviews.Author: Darwin
Reviews.Content: Wife already bought one for the kid but used it more than him so I surprised he with her own.  I was worried about getting some kind of knockoff and not be able to recognize it as this is her area of expertise but she was totally happy and it was the genuine article.

Reviews.Title: Can't tell you how much I love this toy...
Reviews.Author: Joshua
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace my Dell Streak 7 and it's amazing. It's fast, the battery life is great, and the size is perfect. I bought this case: http://www.amazon.com/dp/B008FLYROG/ref=cm_sw_r_tw_dp_JoOlrb0TT6E3J to protect it and to prop it up for use while I'm eating.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: This tablet is wonderful. It's cheap it does everything I want and it's highly customizable. This tablet will probably be best for people who know what they want out of their devices and are willing to do research and take some time to get everything just right.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Tablet
Reviews.Author: Joel D. Rogers "Marine Top"
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent product. Was highly recommended by my son who is a tech geek.  Would definitely recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: Unmatched Quality
Reviews.Author: Zen
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing product for the price, let's get that out the way right from the start. In terms of what you get for bang for buck there is nothing that even comes close. Here is a brief breakdown of the device:Screen: The screen is very clear and sharp. It is set extremely close to the glass (closer than the iPad screen), I personally have a preference for this as it gives the screen the feelings of looking at printed material. The 215dpi means the screen is one of the best on the market.The screen is very responsive to touch, and is almost frictionless.  The downside is the slightly large bezel on the side of the screens, but you will find this on most screens.Battery: I get around 4 hours out of this with intensive use (majority of which is playing graphically intensive games, such as Chaos Rings and Shadowngun). For general web browsing and video watching it will last a good whilst longer. It usually fully charges in under 2hrs, though will take longer if you charge from your PC usb port.Performance: There is nothing negative I can say about this devices performance. It runs every current top-end game without hitch, and can happily multi-task with the game still running. Load up Shadowgun, and then switch to YouTube to watch a video without so much as a pause.Scrolling around the interface is very smooth, though occasionally may pause if you have a load of widgets that need to pull live information from the Internet.Finally: A top end device for an almost budget price, what's not to like?

Reviews.Title: It follows me around the house.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Initially, I hated the thought of tablets. I've always been a desktop guy, and questioned the value. Once you recognize them for the satellite systems they are, they are pretty incredible.It's almost always in the same room I'm in - at the very least, rocking out some Spotify (which I would highly suggest if you grab one). It's a fun toy, easily accessible, with some decent apps.It's snappy (if you aren't running too many apps), easy to use, and plays well with a decent stylus. Don't expect to type much on it, but if you really needed to, you could. The display is pretty, it's easy to scan a quick web page (especially with other devices running), and it's great as a chromatic tuner or to watch videos.I can't actually come up with any complaints, except the 10" may have been a bit better buy. That's purely for screen size, though, and the 7" is still great ;)

Reviews.Title: absolutely love this
Reviews.Author: dk4269
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend has a iPad mini and in bought this and he even says mine is so much better. I wish some programs as excel would work better on here. I can't download or open excel programs and fix things on here.

Reviews.Title: Neat Operation
Reviews.Author: Hank Han
Reviews.Content: I got my Nexus 7, used it.  SImple as that - completely hassle free!Enjoyed the buying and using of it!  Tks!

Reviews.Title: Excellent device
Reviews.Author: Anton Zlotin "Zlotoxa"
Reviews.Content: Excellent screen, excellent performance. Excellent look & feel.I have absolutely no remarks to this product. I would only add hdmi (nice to have)

Reviews.Title: Kids love it.......quality Android product.
Reviews.Author: Teknicolby
Reviews.Content: I can't give this 5 stars only because it crashes more often than I would care to admit. That is the problem with most Android products. I am not an Apple fanboy by any means (I own 6 high-quality Android tablets/phones and am a mobility administrator for a billion dollar a year company so I touch hundreds of devices), but I prefer the iPad and iOS products both on and off of corporate networks. These are built well, but the Google Play Store is like a free-for-all. At least iTunes screens their apps thoroughly and you don't have to worry about your devices' integrity/security like you do with Android/Google Play.I bought two of these. One for my 9 and one for my 5 year old so they would stop fighting over my iPad. Guess what.......they still fight over the iPad. These tablets are great for them, but without influencing them or saying anything (obviously I'd rather keep them off of my iPad or my Surface RT tablet), they still flock to the iPad. I got these for a good price otherwise I would have purchased the iPad minis for them. I got 2 of these for $520, so I couldn't go wrong. $329 for a low end iPad mini is a little expensive.*** Update ***After less than a year of use, one doesn't allow charging anymore and the other is broken (my son's fault). So now I use the broken one's battery and charge port so that I can keep my 9 year old's tablet running. The charge port on hers is junk and I have only used the provided charger to charge it. Android products just frustrate me to no end. These are not as high quality as I originally thought. Should have bought the iPad mini.

Reviews.Title: Laptop killing Tablet!!!
Reviews.Author: M. Woodcock "Mr. Woodcock"
Reviews.Content: Replaces a laptop for many applications.  If typing is not involved, I always use this.  It's got plenty of processing power for just about any app you could ever want or need installed on here.  Fits in your hands just right, it has a nice texture to keep it where you want it in your hands!

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet!
Reviews.Author: Enri Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: This product performs as advertised and previewed! Product design is impressive, especially the picture quality is comparable with my Apple Macbook. Altogether, this device is lovable, and a perfect gift to make someone very happy.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Big Richard
Reviews.Content: A brief introduction:  I'm an Android user and have been going on about 3 years now.  In that time I obviously have come to learn how to work with the OS, and have bought apps I'd like to not lose by switching to some other platform.  I've worked with the Android environment long enough to know what I like and don't like about this tablet.Pros:- Responsive- Good modern specs (good CPU/Ram)- Google keeps it up to date with the latest android versions.- Slim enough to fit in jeans pocket.Cons:- No camera other than front facing.- No HDMI output.- No cordless recharge (like in Nexus 4.)- Battery life could be longer.- Sometimes having it in jeans pocket rubs the power button which turns the screen on in your pocket.After using this since Christmas (it is 2/22/13 now) I can say I don't want to go back to a version of me that didn't have a tablet.  Ever.  I take this thing everywhere and whenever I want internet, I just use FoxFi on my RAZR Maxx.My RAZR Maxx has great battery life, so I'm spoiled.  The tablet has pretty darn good standby time, but the battery will drain noticeably while watching movies or working with the tablet a lot (bigger screen must take more energy.)Accessoris:- I got myself a pair of LG HB-730 Bluetooth stereo headphones.  Watching Netflix in the office has never been better.- I have bought case from Manvex which isn't perfect, but Manvex has great customer support.Conclusion:I think if this thing had a camera and HDMI out it would be an easy 5 stars.  If these two things are important to you like they are to me, it might be a good idea to consider something else.  I got this as a gift so I didn't pick it, but I am extremely happy with it regardless.

Reviews.Title: Love having Google Play
Reviews.Author: Daniel Rangel
Reviews.Content: I have a Amazon Kindle Fire original and a Nook Color, but I don't use them anymore because the Nexus 7 does all they do and more!

Reviews.Title: Nice, but still not an iPad
Reviews.Author: iPadFanatic
Reviews.Content: I have had every iPad and have wondered what I was missing by not having an Android tablet. The answer is, well, nothing, really! Well, let me say that what I AM missing is the extra dollars in my pocket that went to Apple instead.This is a nice tablet, very functional, an almost-iPad, and the number of Android apps is not to be sneezed at. The one feature I really miss on the Asus is a cellular connection like I have on my iPads. With that it would be almost interchangeable with the iPad at a better price point.

Reviews.Title: The best 7" tablet you can buy.
Reviews.Author: scottx.nb @ gmail
Reviews.Content: I've owned six tablets, my first bring an original Samsung Galaxy Tab and my latest being this Nexus 7. This is such a great tablet for the money it cost. Being a Nexus device keeps it super up to date with the latest and greatest Android offering. I also own a Galaxy Nexus, it being my tenth Android Phone. Stick with Nexus devices and you'll always be happy.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful, top-notch tablet
Reviews.Author: dannyswafford
Reviews.Content: It is a great tablet. It's very fast, has good graphics, it's pretty and it's comfortable to hold. A lot of people say that it should have SD-card, but 32GB is enough and there's no need for that. Tablet's battery life is good, you can watch videos, movies, surf on the internet and you still have plenty percents of battery.The front camera is good and allows you to do video calls. Thanks to 3G you can do it whenever you want and you don't need wifi. I wish it had back camera as well, but it really doesn't matter since other things are so good.I would recommend it for everyone who is looking for a fast tablet with android system.

Reviews.Title: good value for low price
Reviews.Author: wktsugue
Reviews.Content: I had thought it would be less useful. But the 7 inches of screen is enough for most of my needs. Reading ebooks is very easy on 7 inches screen . It's excellent having a pure Android system. My next smartphone will be a Nexus.iPad mini is superior . By superior I mean the slightly bigger but compact 7,4 inches screen. and iPad is much lighter than Nexus 7. If counts specially if you use tablet laid off on sofa. But iPad mini almost costs the double of a Nexus 7. Well... the best feature of Nexus is its benefit by cost rate.

Reviews.Title: Best 7" tablet on the market!
Reviews.Author: jes0012
Reviews.Content: I will admit that I was already a hardcore Android fan before this tablet hit the market. Buying this tablet only made my ties stronger. After the Nexus 10 came out, I gave my N7 to my fiancée who is totally in love with it! She's not a very tech savvy person but she has yet to have any problems on this tablet. It is just simply intuitive and easy and just works great! I will be buying only NEXUS device from now on!

Reviews.Title: Very useful and easy to use.
Reviews.Author: T Vining
Reviews.Content: The Nexus 7 tablet is the perfect size for me and my family, and has all the newest features that Android has to offer. Love it!

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: Ramón Lozada
Reviews.Content: muy buen producto excelentes condiciones. comprado desde venezuela. excelente vendedor. el producto que llego es igual al de la descripcion.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Luna
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto me encanto muyu bueno lo recomiendo creo q esta bien el precio la calidad es asus osea de lo mejor del mercado excelente

Reviews.Title: Great!!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this Tablet.  Have the iPhone, iPad 3 but starting to play more with the Nexus....  Looking forward to the next version and I may get the GSM this time...

Reviews.Title: Expectations met and more
Reviews.Author: olga yoder
Reviews.Content: i was looking for something inexpensive but still be able to play games and go online and get help in school.  this tablet met my expectations and more.  with all the apps i can download and use especially some for school and learning a language,  I LOVE IT!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Product, great service!!
Reviews.Author: Naivih Teran Martinez
Reviews.Content: Great Product, great service!! I Recommed both: the seller and the product. I think Google Nexus is fantastic, sturdy and veru usefull, with so many apps to play with.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Stephen
Reviews.Content: I have been using the Nexus 7 for a couple of weeks and absolutely love it. It is awesome value for the price. The only bad thing I can say about the product is that the first Nexus 7 I ordered got to me dead. I tried to charge it and it would not turn on at all. I returned it to Amazon and bought another and have not had a single problem since.

Reviews.Title: Perspective of someone who OBSESSED over what 7" tablet to get over the iPad Mini
Reviews.Author: Matthew Glasson "mglasson"
Reviews.Content: Like many, I struggled mightily with deciding which tablet to buy before committing to the Nexus 7 built by Asus. Overall, I'm very happy with my purchase but I do have a few reservations that I feel are worth noting below.  Just so you all know where I'm coming from, I own the iPhone 4, a MacBook Pro, Mac Pro Tower and a Mac Mini.  I'm pretty well invested into the Apple world and would have gladly gone iPad but I didn't like the high price and the way Apple hijacks all your media to run through iTunes.  Turns out it was not as tricky as I feared it might be to break away from Apple.PROS:GREAT PERFORMANCE - The tablet is fast and responsive when I'm playing games or watching movies or surfing the web. This is a zippy little machine that can hold its own.BEAUTIFUL DISPLAY - very vibrant colors and good contrast.  I've been reading the Steve Jobs bio on here and it's a real treat! Some of the free game apps (such as Temple Run and Fruit Ninja look amazingly vibrant and lush)GOOD APPS - I was concerned about this one because Apple dominates in this field, but my needs are pretty basic: I wanted it to watch/listen/read media and maybe play some games.FORM FACTOR - It's very comfortable to hold/grip although I wish it was a little lighter.FLEXIBILITY - I love being able to plug my Nexus into my mac (any Mac) and open the home directory of the machine using the basic Android File Transfer Program.  No need for iTunes syncing/multiple libraries or being slave to what's available on Kindle - it's a drag and drop operation!PRICE - For the current price of the 32 GB Nexus, you can pick one up, a case and a stand and some apps and still come up well under the lowest price for the iPad Mini.CONSWEAK BATTERY - This is definitely the most disappointing aspect of the tablet.  The performance from the battery is poor even when it's in sleep mode!  If a full charge lasts through a whole day, it's doing well.  Just keep in mind you'll want to carry a separate cable or charger.NO HDMI OUTPUT - As a media guy, I'd love to use this to plug into someone's TV as a video player.  It's pretty lame Google nixed this feature in favor of their "Nexus" product (which I'm not going to purchase - it's more than the tablet itself!)NO SD SLOT - I did purchase the OTG cable but it's kind of lame to have to plug in a loose cable to expand your storage.  I'm not too heartbroken about this tho - 32 GB is a lot and as I mentioned, it's easy to move content on/off the machine.WEAK SPEAKERS - They can perform OK in a quiet room at home but out in public or a semi-noisy room and you will need to work out an alternativeOn the whole, it's a lovely little tablet that is a great foray into the 7" tablet game from Google. With some of the aforementioned issues addressed at the current price point, this would unequivocally get 5 STARS from me.

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Pepper"
Reviews.Content: This is my first experience with Android and with a few searches for video instructions on youtube, I was up and running within a few hours.  It is easy to use and I can't believe I have never bought one of these before!  GREAT purchase.  I give it 100 stars!

Reviews.Title: Nexus 7
Reviews.Author: sbible
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Nexus 7 in October, 2012.  Was the best investment for my money.  It does exactly want I need.  I like the google apps.  Unlike other tablets,can't get all apps.  With the Nexus 7 you can get any apps.  I new to the android world and the lastest technology.  But the Nexus 7 is so easy to use.  I've tried other tablets, but I think this one was the best choice for me.

Reviews.Title: My tablet
Reviews.Author: Evelyn Marrero Matos
Reviews.Content: I like my new tablet because I can access the programs of Google. Everyone should have one tablet  right now.

Reviews.Title: willie sr
Reviews.Author: willie
Reviews.Content: I would advise anyone to buy one I love mine. it works good and will do more than I need.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Allen
Reviews.Content: Bought it at Sam's club. Looked at reviews till I was dreaming about tablets or nightmares. Finally decided on this. I was mostly concerned with the storage. Well I have all my apps from my phone on here and 6gb of music and still have 21gbs left. This is plenty. Screen size is perfect for holding in one hand in portrait or landscape. And my 50+ year old eyes have no problem with it.Build feels very solid to me. You get the very latest version of Android. WAY faster than a net book, which is what I would be using to do what I do on this. But with this I can do way more. Plays games very nicely.Battery lasts for a long time. All this for 250.00.I call that excellent.

Reviews.Title: My dreams Come true
Reviews.Author: M. Tabor "Computer Enthusiast"
Reviews.Content: I have been drooling over this product for months now, planning saving and scouring reviews. It is fast, feels very durable and extremely responsive. Good range on the Wi Fi and Bluetooth (although 4.2.1 Android has some issues with WiFi and Bluetooth in conjunction causing audio skip, Google says they have fix for next release as of a month ago) All and all I would say i got my fantasy fulfilled and i still respect myself in the morning ;)

Reviews.Title: Nexus 7 Best Tablet for the Money
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: The Nexus 7 has been well documented as the best 7" Android Tablet on the market.I have some suggestions for users of the tablet from my experiences.1> Buy a protective case to protect your device. Amazon has numerous choices.2> The Jelly Bean 4.2 update may cause performance issues. These are documented on the Web. You will need to disable the Google Current app and clear the Cache on the device.3> Install the Go Ex launcher which is a great user interface.4> Hopefully, Google will release a fix soon for the Jelly Bean 4.2 issues including poor sound volume.

Reviews.Title: Free of fire
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "mgurin"
Reviews.Content: Part of what I love of nexus 7 is the price I paid. I traded in my original Kindle fire at Gamestop and got $100 trade in on a brand new 32gb nexus 7. Then we discovered box seal was broken so was given an extra 20% off! So I paid about $100 for a state of the art android tablet. Trading in? Go to gamestop's website.I won't make comparisons to ipad because I don't have one and because that's not the target of this device. Completely open android environment is amazing after being locked into the heavily curated amazon world. I can do everything on n7 that I could with kindle fire. Amazon prime video? Yup. Kindle books? Yup. Go to YouTube and do some research and within 15 minutes you will have a nexus 7 that can stream flash video, play amazon videos, etc. I use this for everything now. Be sure to buy SwiftKey keyboard app and the right cover. I bought a bluetooth keyboard but SwiftKey is so good and Google voice to text is so accurate i don't use it much. anyway, the n7 exceeds my expectations in every way.

Reviews.Title: very  good
Reviews.Author: Heitor Temp
Reviews.Content: The Google Nexus is a very good tablet. Fast, powerfull and very portable. I love it, so much. The best Android tablet.

Reviews.Title: Google subsidized = Excellent
Reviews.Author: Cody Swaving
Reviews.Content: Best small tablet on the market. Pure raw power of Android on some of the best hardware available, all for a great price!

Reviews.Title: Perfect tablet for techies and novices alike
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: After my Acer Iconia A100 died, I was looking for a better tablet. I had read a lot of reviews on the Nexus 7 and I had a few reservations. The Nexus 7 offered a better processor, a better screen, and a newer version of the Android operating system. However, it did not have the ability to upgrade the storage and it did not have an HDMI port like my Acer had.I looked at lots of alternatives, including the Acer Iconia A110, a Samsung Galaxy, and numerous others. But I kept coming back to the Nexus 7. For the money, I could not get a better tablet. So I went ahead and bought it. And I am very glad that I did.With 32GB of memory, I am finding that it will be quite awhile before storage becomes an issue. And just as I suspected, storage vendors had begun to introduce portable hard drives with wireless capabilities. The argument for not adding memory expansion option to these tablets was that you could (and should) store most of your data in the cloud. So the portable drives with wireless in essence become a portable cloud for your tablet.The screen on this thing is sweet. You can easily use it for reading or watching a movies. The picture is sharp, clear, nicely saturated, and very responsive.One of my favorite Jelly Bean Android features is the ability to create folders. On the desktop of the tablet, drop one app icon onto another and it creates a folder with both apps in it. I use this to keep related apps easy to find and use. For example, I have a folder for my network tools (I am a network geek by trade), a folder for my news apps, one for my social media apps, etc.The sound on this is pretty good, although I have one complaint (and I am not alone in this): the placement of the speakers on the bottom of the unit puts all of the sound on one side when in landscape mode. Since most people will watch movies/videos in the landscape orientation, this is a pain.I also wish they had not put the power button so close to the volume control buttons. I can't tell you how many times that has resulted in me shutting the screen off instead of turning the volume up or down.In spite of these couple of complaints, my Nexus 7 is by far my favorite tech gadget. Absolutely love it!!

Reviews.Title: Liked it
Reviews.Author: straight-shooter
Reviews.Content: What can I say as of this writing the Nexus is rated as the best Android tablet on the market.

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: peter d mott
Reviews.Content: Not bad for the price. Screen is a little small but the GUI is good. Apps are still a little lacking but not that bad at all. For the money, it's worth it.PM

Reviews.Title: recomendado
Reviews.Author: Reynaldo Robayo
Reviews.Content: excelente articulorecomendado para empresarios y estudiantescalidad de imagen y sonidolos 32 gigas para un usuario normal esta recomendadoaunque por otg se puede ampliarrapidez y la ultima actualizaciones mantendrás al día un equipo optimo!

Reviews.Title: Nexus 7
Reviews.Author: Ronald L. Perrin
Reviews.Content: The Nexus was just what I expected and am happy with it. My wife uses it more than I do.

Reviews.Title: Would buy again. Great tablet
Reviews.Author: jjsmith
Reviews.Content: Opinions may vary from user to user, depending on what their looking for. But honestly is hard to say that this tablet has any issue to rate it with 1 star. There may be a geek that would like a tablet that cooks for him/her or do their homework while they scratch a lottery ticket, but this tablet is perfect for an average-to-advance android user.

Reviews.Title: Great touch pad for the price!!!
Reviews.Author: Yogistra Anderson
Reviews.Content: For the price nothing beats the Nexus 7. The Android OS is polished and very easy and intuitive to use. The battery life is good for this type of product but I wish it was better. This is actually speaks to the amount of usage this I put in on this Nexus. It has a camera, but you can not tell, there is no built in camera app to use it. This is the only negative I can think of. The built quality is excellent, the rubberized back is a plus because it does not slip off slippery surfaces or from your hands.Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: First tablet and very glad I purchased it.
Reviews.Author: S. Jones
Reviews.Content: Having never owned a tablet prior to this and just using the cell phone or regular computer I wasn't sure what I was getting into.  We have android phones with gmail and this tablet essentially is a larger version of the phone.  Sync'ed our email, calendar and other stuff to the tablet.  It works fantastic for what it's intended to do.  No replacement for a laptop but very useful, much lighter, manageable and portable than a laptop as well.

Reviews.Title: excellent choice
Reviews.Author: Erica
Reviews.Content: I had originally ordered a different tablet not as good as this Nexus and returned it because it was not compatable for kids of any age. After getting this Nexus it was so easy to navigate through even my 3yr old likes to use it. Great for my son's books he likes to read and also his games. glad i chose this one. the next tablet i would like to get with a camera.

Reviews.Title: Es good
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: I chose this tablet over a new I pod touch. It is cheap and is sure to please. Love my nexus seven!

Reviews.Title: everything i wanted from it
Reviews.Author: Sean Irwin
Reviews.Content: everything mentioned in product was delivered happy with it. its quick and dependable so far, light weight just wish i had bought a screen protector with it

Reviews.Title: Nexus
Reviews.Author: Cowgirl22
Reviews.Content: Came in the mail right away, sooner than planned! Works great and our daughter loves it!!! All in all Great experience!!!

Reviews.Title: Worth Getting
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This tablet has been great for me. Is it the best and most powerful? No, but at this price and for how long its been out of course its not.This is one of the best tablets for the price.When I seen what Apple was including and charging for the iPad Mini I knew this was the better choice. The iPad Mini is a nice tablet but for what it offers and at that price I couldnt pay Apple that amount when i could a tablet that offered more for less money. It offers a higher resolution display, GPS (you have to purchase the even more expensive celluar version to get GPS with the iPad), and ability to display HD content. I enjoyed the Nexus 7 so much I bought a couple of them. I look forward to getting the next version of the Nexus 7 whenever that is released. Nexus 7 32GB

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: Product works great though I would have liked the screen cover and styles to have come with it but use is rather easy and resolution is great.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the price!
Reviews.Author: Robby
Reviews.Content: This tablet is easy to use. My 7  year old got this for Christmas. She loves this thing..Netflix, movies, Spotify, Kindle book app, and tons of games! She got a drum set, trampoline, and this for Christmas...guess what her favorite present was and still is? This tablet! It's highly recommended on the web and I highly recommend it too!

Reviews.Title: Excellent purchase!
Reviews.Author: Beth
Reviews.Content: I got this for my husband for Christmas. He loves everything about it !! He has found tons of apps, and said the speed is great for Internet. He is on it all the time!!

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: sheldon leonard
Reviews.Content: This is a great product. Does everything a apple I pad can do at a reasonable price. I am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: first tablet
Reviews.Author: rlstuff
Reviews.Content: I checked out a lot of different tablets, for the price and quality this one seemed to be what I wanted. I like the GPS' battery life is good, it seems very fast surfing the web. Its big enough but not to big, I'm very happy with it.the camera works good with Google talk. I wish the speaker's had more volume, its a good buy.

Reviews.Title: best bang for your buck right now
Reviews.Author: allychan
Reviews.Content: Wonderful product. When I first purchased this device I got a lemon. It was slow, glitched out, and took several hours to get to a full charge. I was super frustrated and took it back for an exchange a week later. I got my replacement and it is superb.I bought the Nyko blue tooth gaming controller to play all my old school video games on the tablet. The emulators run smooth and there is no lag with the controller. Only problem I have is disconnecting the controller. Every time the controller is paired with the device, the keyboard function mysteriously disables. When I go to turn off the controller the keyboard still won't pop up unless I restart the device. I would give it five stars if it wasn't for the keyboard issue. I think it may be a glitch with the nexus because the lemon did that too in addition to all the other problems it had.Overall the nexus 7 is worth it for the money you pay. There is no external memory slot so make sure you spend the extra 20-30 bucks and get the 32g especially if you are a media junky.

Reviews.Title: Best bang fot the buck. Very Good
Reviews.Author: Carlos Escalante Gomez
Reviews.Content: Have bought 2, for me and the wifeGood product.Size is just right. Does EVERYHTING you need it to do.The ONLY down side for us, is the absence of a camera on the back to take pics.For the rest an excelente product

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: Hector Duque
Reviews.Content: OK muy buena justo lo que pedi, no he tenido ningun tipo de problema lo recomiendo buen equipo muy veloz

Reviews.Title: Best tablet yet
Reviews.Author: Wendell
Reviews.Content: I have owned various Android phones and an Asus Transformer Prime tablet. I've also used other tablets by way of friends and clients, such as iPad 2 & 3, Galaxy Tab 2 7.0" and Galaxy Note. This Nexus 7 is by far the best I've used. While I loved the drawing capabilities of the Note, the resolution is the same as the Nexus 7, so the pixel density isn't as good. Anyway, my Nexus 7 has been fast, responsive and problem-free for the couple of weeks I've owned it. My only issue, albeit minor, was when I first opened the package and noticed that one corner of the backplate had not been completely snapped into place. I gave it a quick pinch and all was well. But it did leave me wondering about quality control at Asus, especially after my horrible experience with the Transformer Prime. Despite that, I continued on and soon began wondering why I hadn't bought one sooner.I'd always thought that 7" would be too close to my Galaxy Nexus phone's 4" screen and thought, "why bother?" And after using the Transformer Prime, 10" seemed perfect. But now that I have the Nexus 7 in my hands and using it a LOT, I understand why it is so beloved. Part of the reason it works well is because the most popular 10" tablets are the same resolution as the Nexus 7 (although that is changing rapidly) and so you are getting the same real estate as a 10" tablet but without the bulk. I can hold this thing easily in one hand and if I put a case on it, will still be able to hold it the same way.I've ordered a case and waiting for delivery, but not even sure if I'll use it at this point. The Nexus 7 is easy to hold and use as it is. My only concern is safety, so the case may be a good idea.

Reviews.Title: Amazon Price is high
Reviews.Author: S. Smith
Reviews.Content: I ended up buying mine at a Local Gamestop for $249, Walmart also had it at that price but I try to shop as little as possible at WallyWorld. If Gamestop can have it in their retail stores for $249, don't really understand why it's so much higher on Amazon.But anyway, Love it. Originally looking for an E-Reader, and almost bought the Kindle Paperwhite, but with the Nexus 7 I can also read magazines in color and surf the net and play games and watch movies. Would've liked to have an expansion slot, but the 32gb will hold me until they do.

Reviews.Title: Nexus 7 Charger Issue
Reviews.Author: J. Scheifley
Reviews.Content: Love this tablet (my first).  It does almost everything that I expected and it's fast.However, after about a month of use, the charger/tablet connection began to fail and would not make a secure connection for charging or data transfer.  I initiated a live chat with Asus service dept. last Thursday (1/10) and was immediately sent an RMA # and instructions to return the unit.  I sent it by 3 day FedX the next day ($20).  Today I received word that my repaired unit has shipped by FedX.  Excellent customer service in my opinion.Things I've figured out (aside from the usual Android functions):- You can make phone calls if you have a Google account- You can install Adobe Flash (a YouTube video has instructions)  and view HD content  from Amazon PrimeThe only thing missing is the ability to output video to an external device.  The Kindle Fire HD will do this and I am considering getting one just for that purpose.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: POWERBALLWIN84
Reviews.Content: Only had it for less then a day but love it. I was thinking of buying an iPad but so expensive. I own a droid RAZR and all my apps that I already purchased with Google play are there to download on the nexus. I would recommend this to anyone. Great for playing games. The 7 in tablet is just the right size. My wife has a kindle fire and she loves it as does my daughter. That is also a great tablet but is more geared for family and books. The only thing I do not like about this tablet is the power cord is like 3 ft long. Hard to play and charge. Although the battery life seems great even while gaming.I purchased my nexus at Walmart for 249.00 witch seems the cheapest around but as far as cases and accessories amazon is by far the best. A+ tablet

Reviews.Title: Nexus7
Reviews.Author: Ruben Rubio
Reviews.Content: Everything is cool on this tablet!!!Everything looks quite better than others, has a great performance, great size and a good price!

Reviews.Title: Great little tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: weinerdoggy
Reviews.Content: After reviewing this against the Kindle Fire HD for a month or so, all the reviews went toward the Nexus 7, especially if you're an android person.  All my gmail, apps, etc. from my phone went over to this once I logged into my Google account.  It's my go-to tool when traveling vs. my phone because of the larger screen.  I would have rated it a 5, but it doesn't have 3G or 4G, just Wi-Fi.  If you can't afford an i-pad, and you like to have thousands of apps to choose from, this is a great alternative.  The Google Play Store is awesome.

Reviews.Title: Love
Reviews.Author: Caroline N Hoos
Reviews.Content: I'm not much of a techie and can't give any technical reasons for why I love this device, I just find it very intuitive and perfect for my use.  I simply use this to surf the net, watch movies/tv, and facebook and it is perfect.  The screen resolution is stunning!  Feel just as comfortable watching a long movie on this as I do my high-def tv.  Recommend for anyone looking for a table to use recreationally!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: cristal henriques
Reviews.Content: is fast and resolution n the  screen great only thing i would have liked is for the memory was expandable

Reviews.Title: best tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: stephen sikorski
Reviews.Content: this tablet has an amazing screen clarity and works great. We use it for playing games mostly and it works great. no problems.

Reviews.Title: want a tablet? this is the one you need to get
Reviews.Author: Ramses Arreola
Reviews.Content: swift, beautiful and powerful, it's like a date with Maria Brink gone right ;D only topped by an actual date with her but this is way easier and cheaper

Reviews.Title: BOUGHT FOR GIRLFRIEND
Reviews.Author: RALPH
Reviews.Content: She loves it. I don't know much about it other than it does most anything she wants to do. It was a better buy than an Apple 7

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Richard Albrecht "DavidAmI"
Reviews.Content: I researched tablets for a few months, finally decided to get this for myself . Had a more than Happy christmas, do all my web browsing/shopping  app playing on this baby. It's very responsive & hosts many apps that keep your media off tablet. Bought this one specifically for the space, turns out I didn't need all of it..Still have more than 30 gb free.  Mainly used by apps.  I recommend it, for sure!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful tablet.
Reviews.Author: JESSE
Reviews.Content: Fastest tablet you can get now. I wish it had flash although if you search online there are ways to put that on too.Also with a USB OTG cable you can attach an external drive which is great.As much as i love apple- i'm tired of their file transfer and insane restrictions on how data is stored. If you love your freedom, you will love the Nexus!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Sandy Long
Reviews.Content: Just got this a week ago, it's hard to put it down so far it's exactly what I wanted.  I haven't used an android product before and this is great

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Virginia E. Callahan
Reviews.Content: Works far beyond my abi.l.ity to use it to  its fullest. Feel it is easy to use and offers all it advertised

Reviews.Title: Great Item!
Reviews.Author: Brenda F. Lewis
Reviews.Content: The Nexus Tablet was a gift. The person I gave it to loves it! I have one myself and have enjoyed very much.

Reviews.Title: Did not know how bad I wanted one till I got one
Reviews.Author: Veener79
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet.  I debating on getting one for about a year.  Now that I have one I am not sure why it took me so long to get one.  This tablet is great.  It is very fast.  It has a great feel.  I like the 7" size because I can just hold it in one hand and read and read.  Been finding my self doing more with it then I did with my laptop or android phone.  It is the best of both worlds!

Reviews.Title: Excellent product from an excellent seller that provides fast shipping!
Reviews.Author: -Buyer
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this product. I wish this was the first tablet I bought instead of wasting money on others.

Reviews.Title: Google&Asus;
Reviews.Author: Sukru
Reviews.Content: Just like other Asus products,the device is competely satisfactory with its specifications and the material they used is giving the feeling of quality..

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: Aleksandar Stefanovski
Reviews.Content: A love it, great for everywhere good for home good for trip, fast and smooth made me android and google fan :)

Reviews.Title: Excellent.
Reviews.Author: Shane
Reviews.Content: Got the Nexus 7 as a gift. Have not put it down since. Good for web browsing, paying bills, watching shows off Netflix. Synced it up to a Bluetooth keyboard so I can take to class and take notes on it.

Reviews.Title: I love my new toy!
Reviews.Author: Regina McCreery
Reviews.Content: My first tablet. It was between this or a Kindle Fire HD. I am glad I went with Nexus7! It's great having all my google items automatically sync up as well as enjoy the FULL Android JB experience. I know I would have been disappointed with the watered down kindle version. I like being able to access social media or files without having to use data plan on my cell phone or having to leave the room to access the family computer. Knitting as a hobby, it's handy to keep patterns on it and at an arm's reach.

Reviews.Title: Five stars except for the lack of My Library in an Asus product
Reviews.Author: Miss Kate Beckett Parker "RitaLee"
Reviews.Content: I have read the two top reviews and agree with most of what's said.
